objects.text:
• Luxurious padded ear cushions
• Professional-grade audio quality
• Durable adjustable headband
• High-quality wired connection

product_details.name: Premium Over-Ear Studio Headphones - Professional Sound Experience
product_details.description:
• Luxurious padded ear cushions for extended comfort
• Robust over-ear design for superior sound isolation
• Professional-grade audio quality for studio and personal use
• Durable adjustable headband for perfect fit
• High-quality wired connection for reliable audio transmission
• Sleek matte black finish for timeless aesthetic
• Ergonomic design for long listening sessions
• Foldable construction for easy storage and transport
• Large dynamic drivers for deep bass and clear highs
• Premium leather-like material for lasting durability

banner_details:
This banner features a sleek and modern product advertisement layout designed to promote premium headphones. It utilizes a grid-patterned dark background composed of varying shades of grey and subtle design elements like thin white lines and semi-transparent circles for structure and depth. The upper section includes two prominent headline text layers ("heading_1" and "heading_2") set in a bold, futuristic font, denoting product quality. Below that, a tagline ("tagline") in blue provides a supporting message. The right half is dominated by a high-resolution product image ("product_image"), while product features are listed in clear bullet points on the left ("description"). A pricing section ("price") is prominently displayed above a contrasting call-to-action button accompanied by a background rectangle ("cta_background" and "cta").

**Color Palette:**
- Dark Charcoal: #1A1A1A  
- Mid Grey: #303030  
- Accent Blue: #4B6FE8  
- Soft Grey: #606060  
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases sleek, modern headphones that predominantly use a sophisticated monochrome color palette. The primary colors include matte graphite black (#2F2F2F), dark charcoal gray (#3A3A3A), and deep metallic silver (#6C6C6C). The soft padding enhances visual comfort with a slight sheen, creating depth through diffused lighting. These colors blend smoothly, while the subtle highlights on the ear cups and headband edges maintain contrast and definition. For an advertisement banner, consider pairing these core tones with high-contrast accents like electric blue (#007BFF) or neon green (#32CD32) to enhance visual interest while maintaining an edgy yet professional look.
